meanings.definition: The quality or state of being compulsive.
meanings.sent1: Her compulsivenesses made her double-check everything multiple times.
meanings.sent2: His compulsivenesses often led him to organize his desk meticulously.
meanings.sent3: The compulsivenesses of the perfectionist made their friends laugh at their color-coded closet.
meanings.sent4: The compulsivenesses of the detective were like a magnifying glass, scrutinizing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The compulsivenesses of the artist were evident in the intricate patterns of their paintings.

meanings.definition: The tendency to act in a compulsive manner.
meanings.sent1: The compulsivenesses of her shopping habits drained her bank account.
meanings.sent2: His compulsivenesses in cleaning often left his house spotless.
meanings.sent3: The compulsivenesses of the child to collect rocks amused their parents.
meanings.sent4: The compulsivenesses of the student to study were like a never-ending cycle.
meanings.sent5: The compulsivenesses of the squirrel to hoard acorns was fascinating to watch.
